message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly rated by many satisfied customers. I believe it will be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $110?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering this product. I'm interested, but your price is a little high for my budget. Would you consider $80?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $95 for the product?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  To be honest, $90 is the highest I can go.  What do you say?
I'm glad you're willing to negotiate, Bob. Considering your offer, how about we settle at $92 for the product?
